spring-boot 打包
    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>

运行
java -jar -Dserver.port=8888 ./springboot-base-mybatis-02-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar
